version_description:
1. Fixed the issue of unable to log in Facebook
2. Fixed Insta360 Community sharing issue
3. Optimized the Auto Frame feature

1. Fixed the issue of unable to log in Facebook
2. Fixed Insta360 Community sharing issue
3. Optimized the Auto Frame feature

1. Fixed the issue of unable to log in Facebook
2. Fixed Insta360 Community sharing issue
3. Optimized the Auto Frame feature
Routine improvements
Routine improvements
Routine improvements

1. You can now use "Ultra Wide+" an FOV option that makes your wide-angle content even wider (only available in 30fps (16:9) videos).
2. You can now directly post to the Insta360 Community.
3. Starlapse has been improved.
4. FOV can now be adjusted in a live preview while using the app to shoot.
5. You can now use 2.35: 1 aspect ratio via the 360 playback page.

1. You can now shoot in 24/25fps with ONE R 1.1.0 and higher firmware version.
2. 4K@30fps in 4K wide-angle can now apply “Basic Stabilization” and can be saved in mp4 format with ONE R 1.1.0 and higher firmware version.
3. You can now apply 1/2 speed effect in Shot Lab - Stop Motion.
4. You can now switch FOVs of Night Shot photos.
5. You can now update remote control version via app.
6. You can now apply the default LUT color to log video.

Shot Lab now supports a new Dolly Zoom template.
Shot Lab now supports a new Dolly Zoom template.
Shot Lab now supports a new Dolly Zoom template.

1. MultiView can now auto track you while you shoot, keeping you in frame in the vlog window.
2. 24/25fps modes now support in-camera stabilization.
3. The Insta360 Community Forum is here! Check it out in the Settings.
4. The size of watermarks on exported videos have been modified.
5. Routine bug fixes.

1. MultiView can now auto track you while you shoot, keeping you in frame in the vlog window.
2. 24/25fps modes now support in-camera stabilization.

5. Routine bug fixes.

1. MultiView can now auto track you while you shoot, keeping you in frame in the vlog window.
2. 24/25fps modes now support in-camera stabilization.
3. The Insta360 Community Forum is here! Check it out in the Settings.
4. The size of watermarks on exported videos have been modified.
5. Routine bug fixes.

1. The trim function has been upgraded to support trimming multiple clips of the same video.
2. Four new transition animations for 360 videos have been added to "My Stories".
3. The POV+ FOV option now looks more natural.
4. Stitching for Lens Guards now supports chromatic calibration, improving the stitching.
5. You can now send photos to customer service via Private Message.
6. A reminder prompt for “Color Plus" has been added during export to avoid re-exporting.
7. Fixes an issue that caused dark corners and color chromatics in some Night Shot and HDR RAW photos.
8. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements
Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements
Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements

1. You can now use Clone Trail template in Shot Lab to quickly generate shadow clone effects.
2. You can now use SpinView template in Shot Lab to generate different animation videos for a 360 photo.
3. You can now use Parallel Planet template in Shot Lab to achieve the effect of walking inside and outside the planet at the same time.
4. Fixes an issue that caused firmware upload failure during firmware upgrade.
5. You can now apply Dive Case stitching to footage shot with the Dive Case.
6. The effect of Night Shot has been improved.
7. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. "Tricks" page is now available. You can now explore and favorite shooting tricks that interest you.
2. Optimize community videos experience. You can now watch 360 videos immersively.
(Immersively means that you can watch one video on total pages like above picture. The video will be clearer than before.)
3. "Activities" page is now available. You can now get Insta360 Gold by participating in Challenges or Gold Activities, and redeem Gold in the Insta360 Gold Store.

1. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.
1. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.
1. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. You can now add “Freeze Frames” in your edits. This allows you to freeze segments of your video, and reframe those segments. You’ll find Freeze Frame in the Speed tab.
2. The Editor in the Album tab has had general improvements. You can now edit more intuitively.
3. You can now share your content directly to TikTok or bilibili.
4. You can now use “Flash Dash” in the Shot Lab, a new technique that allows you to generate a dashing effect with lightning.
5. You can now edit your Starlapses to set the FOV, adjust the rotation, or use ViewFinder.
6. You can now correct the viewing angle when using the Aerial Mod with the "FPV Spin" button.
7. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. You can now add “Freeze Frames” in your edits. This allows you to freeze segments of your video, and reframe those segments. You’ll find Freeze Frame in the Speed tab.
2. The Editor in the Album tab has had general improvements. You can now edit more intuitively.
3. You can now share your content directly to TikTok or bilibili.
4. You can now use “Flash Dash” in the Shot Lab, a new technique that allows you to generate a dashing effect with lightning.
5. You can now edit your Starlapses to set the FOV, adjust the rotation, or use ViewFinder.
6. You can now correct the viewing angle when using the Aerial Mod with the "FPV Spin" button.
7. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. The ONE R app is now the all-in-one “Insta360 App”.
2. The Insta360 app is now compatible with Insta360 ONE X.
3. You can now migrate files from the ONE X App to the Insta360 App.
4. You can now adjust keyframe positions after setting them on 360 videos.
5. A new split-screen effect has been added to MultiView.
6. Fixed an issue where content took up too much storage space.
7. ColorPlus has been improved. The details of dark spots have been enhanced.
8. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. The ONE R app is now the all-in-one “Insta360 App”.
2. The Insta360 app is now compatible with Insta360 ONE X.
3. You can now migrate files from the ONE X App to the Insta360 App.
4. You can now adjust keyframe positions after setting them on 360 videos.
5. A new split-screen effect has been added to MultiView.
6. Fixed an issue where content took up too much storage space.
7. ColorPlus has been improved. The details of dark spots have been enhanced.
8. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. The ONE R app is now the all-in-one “Insta360 App”.
2. The Insta360 app is now compatible with Insta360 ONE X.
3. You can now migrate files from the ONE X App to the Insta360 App.
4. You can now adjust keyframe positions after setting them on 360 videos.
5. A new split-screen effect has been added to MultiView.
6. Fixed an issue where content took up too much storage space.
7. ColorPlus has been improved. The details of dark spots have been enhanced.
8. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. You can now use PureShot for taking photos. PureShot's AI algorithm enhances your photo's dynamic range and reduces noise automatically, resulting in a clearer, brighter shot.
2. You can now live stream with ONE R, choose between 360 Live and Reframe Live. Supported platforms include: Facebook, YouTube and Kwai.
3. You can now use AquaVision, a new technique that makes underwater content crystal clear. The AI algorithm corrects underwater colors to make them how your eye sees them.
4. ONE X and ONE R creators can now use “Giant Jump” in Shot Lab, a new technique that allows you to transform into a big-headed giant and jump.
5. ONE R creators can now use “Fly Lapse” in Shot Lab, a new technique that mimics a drone's flight through a city.
6. After jump cutting a video, you can now export multiple clips at the same time.
7. You can now pinch zoom to adjust the FOV after setting a keyframe in 360 clips. You can view the parameters of the FOV in real time, the adjusted FOV will be kept on export.
8. Auto Frame has been improved with better AI recommendations.
9. When you edit videos in the app album, the editor now remembers the perspective you last reframed to.
10. Stabilization has been improved to reduce motion blur in low-light conditions.
11. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. Insta360 ONE X2 is now supported.
2. Auto Frame is now available for ONE X2 and ONE R standard and HDR 360 photos. The 360 photo will be reframed based on subject recognition and aesthetic appeal.
3. Deep Track 2.0 is now available, which can now track any moving object.
4. You can now pinch zoom to adjust the FOV in Deep Track.
5. Human targets are now automatically recognized in 360 videos. Tap the + icon to track.
6. The ViewFinder, Deep Track & Update Keyframe buttons are now easier to find.
7. Keyframes will be automatically added to your ONE X2 360 videos when you turn on MultiView or switch lenses during recording.
8. Horizon Lock is now automatically enabled for ONE X2 Steady Cam videos.
9. ONE X2 and ONE R creators can now use “Shadow Clone", "Face Off" and "Flip My Day" in Shot Lab.
10. ONE X creators can now use "Clone Trail", "Dolly Zoom", "Time Flip" and "Jump Planet" in Shot Lab!
11. The "Fly Lapse" Shot Lab template has been improved.
12. "Comic" filter is now available.
13. PureShot is now available for ONE X2 photos.
14. AquaVision is now available for ONE X2 videos.
15. A hovering help button is now available.
16. The Insta360 Academy is now available in "Explore"-"Tricks". You can find all basic tutorials and shooting techniques here.
17. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

8. Horizon Lock is now automatically enabled for ONE X2 Steady Cam videos.
9. ONE X2 and ONE R creators can now use “Shadow Clone", "Face Off" and "Flip My Day" in Shot Lab.
10. ONE X creators can now use "Clone Trail", "Dolly Zoom", "Time Flip" and "Jump Planet" in Shot Lab!
11. The "Fly Lapse" Shot Lab template has been improved.
12. "Comic" filter is now available.
13. PureShot is now available for ONE X2 photos.
14. AquaVision is now available for ONE X2 videos.
15. A hovering help button is now available.
16. The Insta360 Academy is now available in "Explore"-"Tricks". You can find all basic tutorials and shooting techniques here.
17. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. ONE X2 and ONE R creators can now use Stop Motion 2.0 in the Shot Lab.
2. ONE X2 creators can now use Fly Through. During editing, AI can automatically stitch clips to generate a smooth long-shot video, mimicing an FPV drone.
3. Ghost Town has been improved.
4. Setting keyframes for 360 videos has been improved.
5. The style of GPS dashboard has been improved.
6. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. You can now use MultiCam mode when shooting with the ONE R camera. Tap the left icon to enter the MultiView mode, and tap the right icon to switch between the inner and outer lens.
2. ONE X2 users can now use Stitch for Cold Shoe. This feature can optimize the stitch of image after the cold shoe is installed with the camera.
3. You can now modify the email address in My page - Settings.
4. The phone memory usage of the Insta360 app is now optimized.
5. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. You can now use MultiCam mode when shooting with the ONE R camera. Tap the left icon to enter the MultiView mode, and tap the right icon to switch between the inner and outer lens.
2. ONE X2 users can now use Stitch for Cold Shoe. This feature can optimize the stitch of image after the cold shoe is installed with the camera.
3. You can now modify the email address in My page - Settings.
4. The phone memory usage of the Insta360 app is now optimized.
5. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. Insta360 GO 2 is now supported.
2. The camera connection process is now smoother.
3. More themes are now available under Stories — FlashCut. The AI will edit together your chosen clips according to the theme.
4. In the Create a Story editor, you can now also select “FlashCut”. Here, you can choose flat clips of any subject and the AI will edit them together.
5. You can also select “Manual Editing” in the Create a Story editor if you prefer. The editing interface has been optimized.
6. The app will now recommend music for your video in the editing interface according to the video content.
7. You can now use "AI Trim" when editing. The AI can analyze 1-minute or longer flat videos and select the best clips.
8. Face filter is now available.
9. AquaVision has been improved to produce more realistic and vivid underwater colors.
10. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.

1. 360° Horizon Lock can now be applied to ONE R 4K and 1-Inch videos in Pro mode @ 30fps.
2. Loop Recording videos shot with ONE R can now be processed.
3. AquaVision has been upgraded to AquaVision 2.0, with improved underwater colors for ONE R, ONE X2 and GO 2 videos. AquaVision 2.0 can now be applied to ONE R 360 videos too.
4. ONE R 4K & 1-Inch Mods can now shoot 4K 50fps in Pro mode.
5. ONE X2 and ONE R creators can now use "Overtaker" in the Shot Lab.
6. ONE X2, ONE R and ONE X creators can now use "Horizon Flip" in the Shot Lab
7. TimeShift videos are now automatically saved at 6x speed and can be used in Fly Lapse.
8. Routine bug fixes and user experience improvements.
